description:
Privately nestled on a generous 580m² approx. allotment, this thoughtfully designed, 2005 constructed, Homestead Homes, executive residence offers a plethora of home entertainment that flows effortlessly across a salubrious open plan design.

Being offered to the market for the first time, this 1 owner luxury residence is truly the complete home entertainer, with 4 living areas, boutique alfresco entertaining, 5 bedrooms and inground swimming pool offering outstanding resort style at home living.

Sleek porcelain tiles, fresh neutral tones and quality downlights enhance a stately entrance hall where a sophisticated ambience emanates from the open plan design. Enjoy formal and casual living in this bespoke layout where 3 separate ground floor living areas seamlessly combine.

A stunning modern kitchen overlooks a generous family room complete with gas log fire. Cook in style with quality amenities including composite stone bench tops, double sink with filtered water, crisp white cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, corner pantry and a wide breakfast bar.

The fun begins outdoors with a large decked alfresco entertaining area providing elite year-round outdoor living. Stacker doors open to engage the sparkling solar heated inground swimming pool. Grab a drink from your own built-in bar as you cook up a barbecue or throw some pizzas in the wood fired oven.

An upstairs retreat provides a great space for the kids to enjoy their games, while a private balcony offers a leafy outlook to the local neighbourhood. There are 4 generous bedrooms to the upper level, the master bedroom features a ceiling fan, walk-in robe and ensuite bathroom while bedrooms 2 and 3 both offer ceiling fans and built-in robes.

A 5th downstairs guest bedroom is a handy convenience, perfect for the larger family. A double garage with auto panel lift door will securely accommodate the family cars and there is a spacious workshop/man cave ideal for the trading, collector or handyman.

Ducted reverse cycle air-conditioning, automatic sliding gate to the street, a 9 kW solar system and manicured gardens complete a value packed lifestyle entertainer that will appeal to the active and engaging executive family.

Brielfy:
* Ultimate lifestyle entertainer with 5 spacious bedrooms and inground swimming pool
* Stunning porcelain tiles, fresh neutral tones and quality appointments to the ground floor
* Stately entrance hall with both formal and casual living adjacent
* Billiard room with built-in bar and fridge
* Formal dining area
* Open plan family/meals with gas log fire
* Stunning modern kitchen offers composite stone bench tops, double sink with filtered water, crisp white cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, corner pantry and a wide breakfast bar
* Massive enclosed, decked alfresco entertaining area with built-in bar
* Built-in barbecue and wood fired oven
* Stacker doors from alfresco to the pool area
* Sparkling inground, solar heated, saltwater chlorinated swimming pool
* 4th living area/retreat to the upper level
* Private balcony overlooking leafy front yard and neighbourhood
* 5 generous bedrooms, master with ceiling fan, walk-in robe and ensuite bathroom
* Bedrooms 2 and 3 with built-in robes and ceiling fans
* Bedroom 5 to the lower level with ceiling fan
* Bright full main bathroom with deep relaxing bath
* Double garage with auto panel lift door
* Spacious workshop/man cave/storage area
* Automatic sliding gate to the street
* Off street parking available in a wide driveway
* Ducted reverse cycle air-conditioning throughout
* 9 kW solar system for reduced energy bills
* Ultimate executive entertainer, ready to enjoy

Perfectly located within walking distance to local reserves including Swanbourne Reserve, Rowe Reserve and Leopold Conrad Reserve with a small lake, boardwalk, playground, exercise equipment and a public barbeque.

Northgate Plaza is only a couple of minutes away for a modern shopping experience or enjoy the facilities of the Churchill Centre & Gepps X Home HQ. Public transport is close by with the bus route Grand Junction and Fosters Roads.

Nearby unzoned primary schools include Hillcrest Primary, Hampstead Primary, Avenues College & Blair Athol North School. The zoned high school is Roma Mitchell Secondary College. Cedar College is also just a short walk to the end of the street (R-yr12)

Zoning information is obtained from www.education.sa.gov.au Purchasers are responsible for ensuring by independent verification its accuracy, currency or completeness.
